title: BBT Font Launch
content:
BBT font

A Free Font that replaces the k / K english & european alphabets for  
another shape for spiritual / philosophical reasons. When you press k /  
K .....you get a different shape!

This is for users and developers bundling the font on their software applications.

Downloads:

[http://savannah.gnu.org/submissions\_uploads/BBT\_Download.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000002/http:/savannah.gnu.org/submissions_uploads/BBT_Download.zip "http://savannah.gnu.org/submissions\_uploads/BBT\_Download.zip")

comments.content:
So this is your famous [non-profit project](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000002/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43690)? Exchanging 2 glyphs in Gentium ...

I think the new glyphs don't fit very well with the existing glyphs, neither in proportion nor stroke modulation.

I wonder what the mentioned reasons to abandon k may be?

Jens
